module.p: gu -ly is the adverbialising particle, creating adverb-like expressions of manner out of adjectives.

section.p: gu takes an adjective as its complement, deriving an adverbial of manner.

Some examples –
Tha Calum sgìth – tha e ag obair gu trang anns an achadh.
Malcolm is tired – he is working busily in the field. td. 7
